name: Bunny Bash (itch) (SuspensionStudios)
description:
Entry for the 2021 Epic MegaJam - 'Running out of Space'
(Army of one category)

All content was made by me for the purposes of this game jam within the timeframe. 

How long can you last as a lone Fox vs an endless onslaught of bunnies?

Be careful, some bunnies are stronger than others, with magic powers! 

Don't have much time? Try the 3 minute timed mode! 

To get the bunnies, all you have to do is walk into them, either using WASD or thumbsticks on controller. Use your left click to dash and right click to slam. 

The menu cannot be navigated via controller.

The game is fairly demanding so don't expect to run it on weak laptops.
